feed.title: Lac La Biche - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Lac La Biche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac La Biche 4:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -10.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -11.7°C
Wind: S 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
